InformationVerification.name: InformationVerification
InformationVerification.description: Represents the details of the information verification initiated for an object.

AssignedDateTime.description: The date and time when the information was assigned to the verifier for verification.

Comments.description: The verifier's comments to the information verified.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the information verification was complete.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Purpose.description: Specifies the purpose of the information verification, such as collateral lien search or title search.

RelatedInformationVerfId.description: The ID of the related information verification record that this verification record is associated with.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the information verification.

StartDateTime.description: The date and time when the information verification was started.

VerificationObjectId.description: The object for which the information verification was initiated.

VerificationParentObjectId.description: The context for which the information verification was initiated.

VerificationScope.description: Specifies the scope of the information verification.

VerifiedById.description: The user or account who verified the information.
